channel.title: Software update!
channel.description:
UPDATE THIS FUCKING SIMPLEMACHINE SOFTWARE?!
Seriously... How is it old? 3 years, 5 years? The BB code is just terrible. Don't take it to personally, but it seriously needs an update.

item.title: Software update!
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Tom:

I’m fairly sure Moparisthebest has already added anything important from 2.0.6. The forum version is historically inaccurate, it says three different versions depending on where you look.

y no new themes yet?

Read full topic

item.title: Software update!
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

Tom:

As far as I’m aware the forums are up to date, whenever an update is released Moparisthebest goes through it and manually applies the changes we need. What is it exactly you’re finding that is so out of date? What is wrong with the BB code?

Hehe, You’re right. However there is something new:

http://download.simplemachines.org/

and we have 2.0.5

Although I don’t think there is a big difference.

Read full topic
